channel.title: Startpage on Luzerner Spieltage
channel.description: Recent content in Startpage on Luzerner Spieltage

item.title: Partners
item.description: .logo-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(2,1fr); grid-gap: 50px; justify-items: center; } .logo-grid img { width: 250px; } .logo-grid .smaller { width: 140px; }

item.title: Program
item.description: A rich and varied programme is provided on the Luzerner Spieltage: Source: Library, Luzerner Spieltage 2018 Card and board games The large library with games for young and old, for strategists and connoisseurs, for individual or team fighters is the focus of the event - discover games with us, which we will explain to you on site without you having to pick up the rule book.

item.title: Roleplay
item.description: Only english rounds are being displayed. For the german game rounds please change language of the website. Dungeons & Dragons Beginnerfriendly Family friendly Fantasy Magic Puzzle Improvisation Game master: Daniel Player count: 4 Time: Saturday, at noon Duration: 3-4 hours Language: English Description This adventure is set in a medieval town called Rotherham. 3 man strive for power in this city and the civilians suffer under the situation.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Write us and we will get back to you within 24 hours. Name * E-mail * Message * Leer lassen document.querySelector('.c-form--captcha').style.display = 'none'; Error: Your message is sadly been marked as SPAM and not been forwarded. Please try again. Thank you for your message! item.title: Newsletter
item.description: First name * Family name * Email address * Interests Luzerner Spieltage Board games Luzerner Rollenspieltage Role-playing games Luzerner Tabletoptag Tabletop games Please choose at least one topic. item.title: Helping
item.description: Hello friends. The next Luzerner Spieltage are just around the corner. And we need you for that! Please contact us today and let us know your dream job. Of course we try to meet your wishes, but we are happy if you are flexible. Our goal is to keep the duration of the shifts as short as possible. The Spieltage last as follows: Saturday, 7 March 2020, 10 a.m. to midnight
